app_descript:
Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY

Brief: Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY is a versatile mobile app that enables you to effortlessly command your Canon printer right from the convenience of your smartphone or tablet. From printing multiple photos to scanning documents directly to your device, this app simplifies the way you interact with your Canon printers and streamlines your document and photo management processes.

Core Features:

  • üñºÔ∏è Batch Printing: Effortlessly print up to 39 different images simultaneously, saving time and streamlining your photo projects.
  • üîß Remote Copy Adjustments: Make copy settings changes directly from your device, ensuring your copies are perfect without touching the printer.
  • üìÑ Easy Scanning: Convert your documents and photos into PDF or JPEG formats quickly with your mobile device.
  • ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud Integration: Access and print materials directly from SNS platforms and cloud storage services like PIXMA Cloud.
  • üõ†Ô∏è Ink and Support: Monitor ink levels, order new cartridges, and consult the online manual for troubleshooting‚Äîall through the app.
  • üì± NFC Feature: Utilize NFC-touch to print and scan without the need for complex setup procedures.

Pros:

  • üëç Convenient Document Handling: With seamless printing and scanning, you can manage documents more effectively.
  • üëç Remote Printer Management: Adjust printer settings without having to be physically next to your printer.
  • üëç Integrative Cloud Services: Directly print from various online platforms, making it a snap to handle online content.
  • üëç Real-Time Support: Access support and product manuals instantly in case of any issues or queries.

Cons:

  • üëé File Type Limitation: The app currently only supports JPEG format for image printing.
  • üëé Screen Display Dependency: If your device improperly displays data, it may produce incorrect print or scan results.
  • üëé Hardware Requirement: NFC printing and scanning demands compatible smartphones and tablets that have NFC.

Price:

üíµ The Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY app is a free utility for Canon printer users. However, the cost of ink and other consumables is additional, varying based on the printer model and cartridge requirements.

(Because the described app is not a game app, no 'Community' section is included.)
